    FRAMES NO FRAMES

    NEXT\Core

    Class Autoloader

    public abstract class Autoloader

    Handle class autoloading and include paths
    This class allows to register folders and files which will be used to search for classes to do autoloading.
    Additionally a folder can be added to the php include path.

    STATUS: final

    Field Summary

    protected static array $classFile
    protected static array $classFolder
    protected static string $basePath

    Field Detail

    $classFile

    protected static array $classFile = array()

    Class File Array - used by self::autoLoad to more quickly load core class objects without making a file_exists call.

    $classFolder

    protected static array $classFolder = array()

    Class Folder Search Array - used by self::autoLoad to to search for class files

    $basePath

    protected static string $basePath

    Path to check file path against If a file is outside this path an exception will be thrown on autoloading

    Autoload

    public static boolean Autoload(string $strClassName)

    This is called by the PHP5 Autoloader.

    This is called just too much because class_exists() call the autloader unless the secend parameter is false, which is not the case in the T3 source code.

    Parameters

    $strClassName -
